website_summaries.verdict: Clean lines combined with an understated rustic finish lend this dresser an air of laid-back elegance.
pros: Modern design is beautifully complemented with rustic detailing
Low-key, natural woodgrain finish works well with just about any color scheme
Conveniently pre-assembled – simply install the handles and you're all set
cons: Some complaints of minor cosmetic damage upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Going to do a review to bump up the rating, previous reviewer doesn’t understand its an issue with their shipping company, not the product. As you can see in my photo they do a lot to reinforce the package to prevent shipping damage, it’s appreciated. On that note, I got the matching night stand first to see how well the quality and finish is, needless to say I was impressed so got this dresser to go with it. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this dresser it looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser it looks great! It is super heavy, even with the drawers out it was hard for 2 people to bring inside but once inside it is worth it. Can't beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Have not fill it up yet. But it was a great experience so far. They called to let me know when they will deliver, called when they are close. The dresser was packed well and assembled. So easy to just attached the handles. It looks so beautiful in the bedroom. see photos attached
customer_reviews.author: NYFashion1

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was expecting something a little closer to Ikea quality furniture .. but I was pleasantly surprised when I received it! SO sturdy and HEAVY. It arrived completely assembled, and the composite it's made of actually looks and feels like a solid wood dresser. The drawers are very deep too! All around this is an amazing piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Brent S.

customer_reviews.title: Great solid dresser.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, mine came assembled and really well packaged, it has to be sent by a freight co. cause of the weight. Perfect condition, no scratches, draws fit just right and well placed. Looks cool and fits in with the sort of Japanese motif. It weighs at least 2X as much as I was expecting. If it's for a kid I would think about using the anchor so it doesn't tip cause it's a little taller than it looks. Whom ever put it together did a good job, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great piece and great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the finish of the Zelen collection. The instructions about delivery made me really nervous to receive the product and be able to complete an inspection upon arrival. I ended up just picking it from the carrier because I couldn't be home for a delivery. The packaging was incredible! There was no way this thing was moving inside the box and I am very grateful! It took my husband and I probably about 10 solid minutes just to remove all of the pieces around the chest. It was fully assembled except the drawer handles. I love it and can't wait to finish purchasing the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Unique look and much cheaper than Ashley Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is the same exact dresser that sells for much more at Ashley Furniture. And Ashley Furniture would have charged me $99 to deliver. The dresser looks nice in our spare bedroom. Even though I know the price is rather cheap and, therefore, I can't expect a super well-made piece of furniture, I still just gave it 4 stars because it's not 5 star quality. But it looks nice and is perfect for a spare bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Pro: Roomy and assembled!  Con: It was scratched
customer_reviews.text: The product came assembled, wasn't expecting that! They shipped it on a big wooden pallet and then boxed up thoroughly tight. Upon opening the box, almost everything was great. Only problem is that a top facing corner was scratched up pretty hard. I think if I find some matching color wood color filler I can hide it. You definitely want to strap this in to a wall, it tends to lean forward and rock easily on carpet, I had to stuff cardboard under the legs to straighten it out. On the back it comes with some straps you can use, but I went for stronger earthquake straps myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: great dresser! The only thing that was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: great dresser! The only thing that was a little odd was I was given a delivery window of a couple days. They dresser came early with less than 24 hrs notice. I was out of town and worked it out with the driver where to leave it but would have liked more notice to plan my schedule. Also, the dresser looks like it's more drawers than it actually is. Two of the drawers have 2 handles so really 7 drawers even though it looks like 9. Regardless it's a great dresser and we love the look in our bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Bedroom Furniture
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is good looking and solid. Easy to unpack. The only assembly required was to attach the 8 handles. The shipping was pretty much on the unknown side. Amazon, Dealz and the shipping company, EFW, seemed to nail down the arrival date as "sometime". When the piece arrived the gentleman brought the piece to my apartment, all the way into my bedroom. Although it arrived 5 days ago, Amazon still has it marked as on its way. The dresser looks like it has 8 drawers but the top two are double, each one with two handles. I wish that it had been made with those two large drawers as four.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck and Amazon it great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser arrived broken pretty bad. Thank goodness my husband had the presents of mind to have the drivers open the box before they left it with us. They didn't want to open it, telling my hubby that they left their knife in the truck, so my hubby got his own knife. The dresser was pretty badly broken... Very cheap materials. We had the drivers take it with them on the spot. The AWESOME part is that getting our refund was very easy. The Amazon people were on top of things. Great Company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Barilla

customer_reviews.title: Has the advantage of being pre-assembled but...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to gauge the quality of furniture when buying online. I purchased this dresser since it had the advantage of being pre-assembled. It is reasonably attractive but I would say it's slightly LESS sturdy than a piece of Ikea furniture that would cost half as much (but would need to be assembled). It certainly serves its purpose but will not be an enduring piece of furniture. Also the drawers are not as deep (front to back) as I would have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Love this chest of drawers!
customer_reviews.text: I was very scared to order a piece of furniture from Amazon that I haven't actually seen in person. I rolled the dice and couldn't be happier. The color is fantastic, exactly what I was looking for. The chest of drawers is sturdy and doesn't seem "cheap" at all to me. I get compliments on it every time someone sees it. Definitely a good purchase! I also bought the dresser and they're a perfect pair.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Love this dresser.
customer_reviews.text: I was very scared to order a piece of furniture from Amazon that I haven't actually seen in person. I rolled the dice and couldn't be happier. The color is fantastic, exactly what I was looking for. The dresser is sturdy and doesn't seem "cheap" at all to me. I get compliments on it every time someone sees it. Definitely a good purchase! I also bought the chest of drawers and they're a perfect pair.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but shipping box perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was perfect so it was NOT the shipping company, it was the company that boxed the item! The front had scratches and gashes while the back had a six inch hole and the drawers were misaligned!!! Definitely the manufacturer! The dresser was beautiful and felt sturdy enough but not the quality I expected for what they charged. DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Original Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Dresser fine.  Delivery service not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Dresser is so-so quality. At least it is put together already. It’s tall and top heavy so you definitely need to anchor yo the wall. Delivery service showed up at 6:20 in the morning even though I had made the appointment at 9-12. Problem was no one was available that early and they had to leave outside in front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L Collier

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: So happy Ashley furniture can be purchased on Amazon. The deliver for this was extremely well organized and showed up in the window they said. The drawers are deep and handles were easy to install. These are very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: golf4278

customer_reviews.title: Was Delivered Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dresser, it's good looking but unfortunately it came damaged. There are holes in three of the drawers and the trim along the bottom is loose. Returning it would be more of a hassle than it's worth, so we will try to fix what we can and keep it.
customer_reviews.author: JessBess

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dresser. Love the modern look. Seems sturdy. Only thing I wish was the double drawers in the middle were actually separate drawers and not just super deep drawers. Other than that though, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this dresser and it's pretty well built. I think it is worth the price also. I hope it holds up for a while considering it is not real wood. Love that it came assembled already and was packaged well. Only complaint I have is that it was missing a screw that held the drawer track in place. This caused the track to fall crooked and didn't hold the drawer in very well. I was able to fix on my own by drilling a new hole and putting a small screw in.
customer_reviews.author: kellie schultz

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I found this dresser
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found this dresser! First off it comes already assembled!!! And very sturdy. Just attach the knobs! The color is spot on. And the company called and set up drop off time with me. So it wouldn't be left outside. I love it so much I purchased the nightstand as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Very classy. Great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: First piece of furniture I purchased for my new home. I love that its large enough to fit all my clothes. Did have small amount of damage, but I can hardly be upset, as shipping something of that weight is tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry2

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not drawers come off track very easily.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful looking dresser for the price, but unfortunately the quality leaves something to be desired. I have always had trouble with the drawers staying on track, but the top right drawer is the worst. I have rotated the top drawers around to see if the actual drawer was off in size, but it is the track itself that will not support the drawer. Every time I attempt to pull the drawer out, it thumps and comes completely off on the left side. Very annoying, so have stopped using that drawer entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...good quality for the price I paid...hard to unpack.
customer_reviews.text: I love the piece, it is exactly what I needed and it looks great. The only problem was that it was extremely difficult to unpack and the guys who dropped it off refused to help, and to make things worse they dropped it off backwards so I had to turn the piece around in my bedroom by myself in very restricted space.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy V

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer error and no help fixing it.
customer_reviews.text: The predrilled holes in the three top drawers were not the correct size for the handle pulls. Amazon would not work with me on getting new drawers. They said I would have to repackage and ship back the entire dresser. If you look at the dimensions of the dresser, it’s huge! I was willing to ship back just the drawers and they refused.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W

customer_reviews.title: Drawer rails fall out & rip inside wood, not supportive!  peeling finish.
customer_reviews.text: Worst dresser ever. We bought this dresser two different times because the 1st one was broken. The 1st dresser had a drawer rail that was ripped out of the wood upon arrival. We returned that one & the 2nd dresser came. As soon as we opened that box, the drawer rails were also loose & coming out of the wood on the other side. The finish on the furniture is cheap & peels off very easily. Amazon was great with the returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as high quality as I would have liked, but it will do
customer_reviews.text: The firs delivery was awful. The whole dresser came damaged and broken. I had to wait a few weeks for a new one to be delivered and for them to take the old one away. It's pretty, but not something that will last years to come. Also you will NEED to anchor the dresser to the wall. It's definitely top heavy and if it's for young kids it will be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This came damaged. I managed to fix the broken drawer however, another drawer continues to fall off the track when pulled out. Too much trouble to return so decided to just live with it as is. Very nice looking however internal rails on one drawer bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Dresser is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking dresser that is well built. It was delivered assembled so very little work - installing the door pulls - before it was usable. Delivery was on-time and faced no problems.
customer_reviews.author: p0.An

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Broken Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Im probably going return it today! Just got it and unpacked it and the dressier drawer is broken. Probably has a lot to do with the cavemen that delivered it. A LOT of bangs as they brought it in. Sad because I really like it, but broken parts on brand new things is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Kareem S.

customer_reviews.title: Priced well and lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a date late but overall it was ok. Would be nice to have the option for placement in the house. That option was listed. It’s a large item and more thought should be considered.
customer_reviews.author: Key chain

customer_reviews.title: Initial Issue, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the top drawer broken off -- reached out to customer service and eventually got a replacement drawer mailed after a week. Thanks for the follow-up -- the dresser itself is great and comes assembled, which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F

customer_reviews.title: This Dresser is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is perfect! I had no issues with dents or scratches. All I had to do was put on the handles. It looks really good in my place and it feels like a really solid piece of furniture. The drawers are so smooth as well. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: R Henley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After the terrible delivery service delayed the delivery for over a week when I finally unboxed the dresser it was broken. If I had to guess it was because of the delivery company; however, that also speaks to the sturdiness of the dresser. When I opened the dresser one of the front drawers wouldn’t shut & when I checked the back I noticed it was because the back looked like it had been kicked in and was blocking the drawer. There is also pieces of the material on the front of the dresser peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised by the quality! It looks just the picture, very sturdy, drawers are smooth, and I am very happy with my purchase. The only thing I would have done differently is to pay for the upgraded delivery. This thing weighed way more than what the shipping weight is listed at. My invoice said actual weight was almost 300 lbs. Oh and the packaging.. insanely well packed. Worth the money, well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Was able to assemble by myself and in under an hour. Color and quality were as expected. Minus one star because two of the screws were stripped and some of the handles needed extra work to ensure sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Drawer!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into my apartment and was nervous about purchasing a drawer online since I've had some questionable experiences, but this drawer does not disappoint! Although very heavy, the quality is nice and the finish of the drawer is clean. Would recommend if you're looking for a sturdy & good quality drawer!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: I was missing this piece to the set I currently have. Super excited to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 2nd try, received, opened top of box and it was broken too. Returning again. Will not buy another
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dresser. I was disappointed that it really done ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dresser. I was disappointed that it really done NOT have 6 bottom drawings. Its 3 small drawers on top and (2) over sized middle drawers and (2) drawers on bottom. Now I love the over sized middle drawers!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. Love the style but built with cheap particle board. Must ensure that NO KIDS are around the furniture as it scratches easily. had a minor issue with one of the pieces but customer service was top notch. OVerall its very nice piece of furniture for the price. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nahir Gil

customer_reviews.title: material is weak and prone to damage during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok for the price I paid. The particle board backing was dented in a tad and slightly warped the rear, but you don't really see that when its against the wall. Aside from that, the trim pieces are slightly off and have gaps, but not too noticeable. Its worth the price you pay for i guess
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dresser. Order with plenty of time (weeks) to plan.
customer_reviews.text: Other than a trip around the world before finally reaching me, the product itself looks just as pictured. It is a gift, and my other half won't see it until this coming weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Broken and dry rotted dresser drawer.
customer_reviews.text: This product was just unpacked, and started to put on hardware and the middle left drawer was totally dry rotted and drawers track is not even in place. Photos if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.text: dresser is uneven, had to get stoppers. very wobbly, I just hope it does not fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Very large & heavy piece. The 2 middle drawers ...
customer_reviews.text: Very large & heavy piece. The 2 middle drawers are actually just one deep drawer which was very disappointing. Also, the color is more of a light brown rather then the warm gray as it's described by Seller. I would not have purchased this piece if I saw it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dresser Arrived Damaged, Amazon won’t replace
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy dresser! Nice color, Very heavy! Arrived damaged, Amazon accepted the refund but won’t Honor a replacement!! Very disappointed especially since it looked like it was damaged Prior to delivery And during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!! Not Worth The Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the dresser and unboxing it (no visible damage to packaging) I noticed some drawers not sitting right. Upon further inspection, I found one drawer to be cracked, pulled apart and two drawer slides broken and pulled away from inside of dresser. Over all, this dresser seems to be very poorly constructed. I have purchased several pieces of furniture from Ashley, this is the first time with this problem.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it but it looked like it would have been nice and sturdy. Chest came broken and a mess. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: a great dresser
customer_reviews.text: The delivery guys were outstanding and put in the room i wanted....the dresser is amazing and sturdy and the perfect birthday gift for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gawron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is not level, there is a gouge in the right front panel. We have been ripped off !!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality, got it today and left and right already damaged, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Roelfina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but bad finishing
customer_reviews.text: Even thought it was nicely wrapped but had scratch on top. Finishing was not good. Returned it immediately after unpacking it. I would have kept it if it didn’t have the scratch and finishing problems. Delivery was great.
customer_reviews.author: NGK

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 2.5 Stars if I could. I was looking for a narrow dresser to fit into my grey bedroom, and while this product does look nice and does the job, it is not the quality I was hoping for. Fake wood, cheaply made, staples showing in back which is not a solid piece but rather a fake black backing. Also own the matching night stand. Middle drawers are double drawers, so are deep, and having 7 drawers does provide lots of storage. Overall, its probably higher quality than other cheaply made dressers, but if you shop around at local stores, can likely find something made from real wood for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Build quality is in line with the price, but looks like it costs far more then it actually did. Comes fully assembled, which makes unpacking a little difficult - but still much less difficult then assembling from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with furniture purchases
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is sturdy .very nice in color and design . Only reason it’s a 3 star for me because it came a bit defective in the overall look
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my grandsons room and he ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandsons room and he likes it a lot. He told everyone not to touch it, I’d say that’s an A+
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was fine, but corner of the top left drawer was ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was fine, but corner of the top left drawer was damaged. I assume it was damaged before it was packaged. The bottom drawers are much more gray than depicted. The back on one side was not properly stapled.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Ichinaga

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Dresser, but Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Dresser was pretty beat up. I’m disappointed. Cracks, a bent drawer and a drawer face that’s separated from the side portion of the drawer. I’m sure that’s more of the shipping companies fault. Waiting on a replacement. Kind of a pain to have to wait another week. Hoping the next one is in good shape. Definitely need to use the anti-tip strap that it comes with. It’s tall and skinny and would easily tip if not bolted to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality for the price- looks expensive and came already put together! BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Geist

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be extremely sturdy and is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very well done dresser. Seems to be extremely sturdy and is very heavy. It looks great as well. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Oliver

customer_reviews.title: kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: kinda flimsy , looks good though , I,m a single guy so it'll last but for good solid furniture save your money and get something better , solid wood would be best .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: This would have been perfect if it would have been put together properly. Someone got lazy when putting it together so when it got to me it was destroyed. Really disappointed. Spend the extra $80 and get it directly from Ashley.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rangitsch

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Just wanted
customer_reviews.text: Goes with the rest of my bedroom furniture. Needed more storage, looks great! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Delivery guy
customer_reviews.text: The product so far looks good. The worst part was the delivery! I live upstairs and the delivery guy came alone and couldn’t bring it up the stairs, I have no one to help him, so he left it downstairs. Extremely upset that this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Monica soto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, already assembled. Good shipping and handling. Decent amount of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great and the dresser looks just like the photo; however this is a very cheap piece of furniture. It will not hold up to regular use. The draws are flimsy and are nothing more than sturdy cardboard. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chest! It is just beautiful! It's very sturdy, but it really stinks! I had to put cedar blocks in each drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The drawers are a touch shallow
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The drawers are a touch shallow. Not exactly what I would consider gray. It is more rustic looking than I expected. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka M. Tew

customer_reviews.title: Drawer Gliding Problems!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chest for my son. We expected it to be an easy assemble. 1. Open the box. 2. Apply handles. Instead, 2 drawers would fall down on the others. If set on the glider on one side, they would fall from the other side. If you can maneuver and Macgyver, you should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: both big drawer tracks were broken upon arrival, back panel was not stapled on correctly, missing one screw to put on handle.
customer_reviews.author: richard tian

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the dresser vey much
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the dresser vey much. Glad I used the service to have the delivery team move and unpack the dresser to the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: this was very nice, delivered assembled, easy to put on handles, packed very good so no damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged in four places which was as bad as I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Not unattractive - note that the finish is a thin veneer over composite. Came damaged in four places which was as bad as I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: J Ro***

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without the drawer handles
customer_reviews.text: We like the dresser, but it arrived without any drawer handles.
customer_reviews.author: C. Longino

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and sturdiness of the furniture
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and sturdiness of the furniture, but the drawers are so shallow they barely fit anything in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be, that said it is very well constructed,drawers fit perfect, color is great no chips and it came put together all I had to do was put knobs on Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Norrish

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute cheap crap! Items were destroyed during shipping, no replacements available, a complete cluster Do not buy this junk
customer_reviews.author: Slappy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set of drawers, providing a lot of space for clothes despite being narrow and not taking up much room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DJNDC

customer_reviews.title: I love the dresser
customer_reviews.text: I love the dresser. It fits my needs exactly. No damages or missing handles. The hardest part was the unpacking. Packed very very well.
customer_reviews.author: rarcbi

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful!! Arrived assembled accept for handles. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for spare room
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this piece after ordering the nightstand and headboard. Great for spare room. Very disappointed that item and its replacement arrived damaged. Update - 3rd replacement arrived damaged. Item will be returned. Will not try again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The drawers are a touch shallow
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The drawers are a touch shallow. Not exactly what I would consider gray. It is more rustic looking than I expected. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Ericka M. Tew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: unable to use it, have to return it, product is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for what we were looking for. Minimal assembly required. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Dalessio

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this dresser
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this dresser! Solid and very heavy. One of the drawers came cracked and I called customer service and they are sending out a new one to replace. Very helpful! Would buy this again if I ever needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Britt T

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews this product arrived damaged in multiple places. Shipping box was perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Uppena

customer_reviews.title: Great for spare bedroom. Shows nice.
customer_reviews.text: It is great for a spare bedroom. Looks very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good, I’m so happy that I found it here!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it when I only have to attach the handles!! It's heavier than what I thought it would be.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, drawers slide easily, no assembly required. Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my room
customer_reviews.text: The first one came in damage on a Conner. Within a week Amazon replaced it. No problems with these on. Looks great in my room ,

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Came mostly assembled. Sturdy and well-made. I have the bureau with a mirror already and had to buy the matching dresser. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy design with a modern look. Quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Totally inadequate packing and packaging for shipments
customer_reviews.text: The chest is what we expected. The issues we have are not with the chest or it's quality. It took three different shipments to get the product to me in a usable condition. The first was not the right item. The second was seriously damaged in transit due to the poor packing and packaging. The third arrived OK. I can definitely say I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Alyea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but cheep materials and not packaged well most likely will come with,some damage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter liked it enough to want me to order for her as well (for XMas)

customer_reviews.title: I just love it, and it came in perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just love it,and it came in perfect! I'll be ordering the night stand also.

customer_reviews.title: Construction is quite poor. It definitely has the look I wanted but ...
customer_reviews.text: Construction is quite poor. It definitely has the look I wanted but will probably be replacing in a few years unfortunately. Seems very cheaply made, and it arrived damaged. I would add a photo but the app is not letting me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As pictured and good quality. Just saw at American Furniture Warehouse for about $100 cheaper though!
customer_reviews.author: Earworm

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Harlinton Dresser, Warm Gray/Charcoal
product_meta.description: Style:Harlinton DresserWith its unique two-tone treatment of replicated oak grain and metal, harlinton is where modern meets vintage in the coolest possible way. Beautifully weathered treatment of the inlaid plank-style boards has a very “reclaimed” quality, while the metal framework and ultra clean-lined design is urban chic. Six smooth-gliding drawers make for an organized wardrobe.
feature_bullets: EARTHY BEDROOM DRESSER: Bring an earthy element into your space with this 2 tone dresser designed with a reclaimed wood look; Metal framework modernizes the natural palette for urban chic style
WEATHERED TREATMENT: Made of veneers and engineered wood in a replicated oak grain finish; Inlaid plank style boards are distressed for a reclaimed wood look
INDUSTRIAL DETAILS: Dark metal framework and drawer handles add a cool, urban chic touch to this piece of furniture
STORAGE SOLUTION: There's plenty of space to store all of your clothes and belongings with 6 spacious drawers; This dresser storage unit measures 62.25 inch W x 15.5 inch D x 36.5 inch H
ARRIVES ASSEMBLED: Ready for instant enjoyment in your bedroom or living room; Matching dresser mirror available and sold separately
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries; The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses; For every taste and budget; Since 1945
